All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ConsoleColor
ConsoleColor stores colors
Course
Represents a course
CourseRepository
CourseRepository extends the RepositoryJDBC class the class updates instances of class type Course in the database
CourseRepositoryTest
tests the methods from the CourseRepositoryTest class
ICrudRepository<E>
CRUD operations repository interface
InputException
the InputException is an exception class the class is used when an invalid input was introduced
InputMismatchException
the InputMismatchException is an exception class the class is used when a wrong input type was introduced
Main
 
NullException
the NullException is an exception class the class is used when a null exception occurs
Person
Represents a Person
RegistrationSystemController
the RegistrationSystemController class has the following functionalities sorting students by their last name,sorting courses by name filter student/courses after credit enrolling a student to a course retrieving courses with available places deleting a course from the teachers and students course list,updating the credit score of a student after the course was deleted deleting the enrollment for the deleted course getting all students enrolled for a course,getting all courses,finding a course,finding a student,finding a teacher, saving the data to database
RegistrationSystemControllerTest
tests the methods from the RegistrationSystemControllerTest class
RepositoryJDBC<T>
RepositoryJDBC implements the ICrudRepository interface the class creates the connection to the database
Student
Represents a Student the class extends the class Person
StudentRepository
StudentRepository extends the RepositoryJDBC class the class updates instances of class type Student in the database
StudentRepositoryTest
tests the methods from the StudentRepositoryTest class
Teacher
Represents a Teacher the class extends the class Person
TeacherRepository
TeacherRepository extends the RepositoryJDBC class the class updates instances of class type Teacher in the database
TeacherRepositoryTest
 
View
class View uses the RegistrationSystemController provides a menu for students and another menu for teachers,each menu has its specific actions provides Input validation methods, stores currently logged in student or teacher
